Articles.Content:
Hello,

This is a rocket i built today.

I was able to Land with it on the Mun and it was my first sucessfull Mission to the Mun and back

Here is a picture

I also made an album from the mission, also there were a few explosions on the Mun when i landed... but i made it back home.

http://imgur.com/a/6GPku

The Rocket should work with Down Under and NovaPunch.

Maybe you could give me some tips to improve my rocket
Great rocket, very wobbly though, but reliable.

Its only a bit wobbly when your on the launchpad you are at about 0.2ms and with the winglets its ok.

also when your launching its going straight with SAS on without doing anything, you can burn all stages without spinning and you are always in the center of the navball
hi where do you get the parts needed to build this ship ?

hi where do you get the parts needed to build this ship ?

I made it using Down Under Aerospace http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=3362.0

and Nova Punch http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4180.0
Very nice, that cluster of SRBs makes a pretty nice booster.
